#summary Contents of the DFT folder

== Files ==

*main.c (original file):* takes a file input.wav and produces a TFA output.<br>
Output is space delimited (three numbers per line) and terminated with a \n:<br>
`Time = (token[0] / 5ms)`<br>
`Frequency = 2.0 ^ (token[1] / 31.0)`<br> 
`Amplitude = 2.0 ^ (token[2])`<br>
